value.string: This is the Master Bot which will carry on all tasks and drive all the child Bots related to GST Processing.
Modified By :  Adita, Date : 14th May , First Draft of development
Supply Input parameters : Comment on GO-LIVE,  This step is to supply the input parameters of the bot if any to run the bot independently, mostly used for debuging purpose
2. Configuration :  This section is to set the configuration parameters. Set dicConfig from master config i_Config
3.1. Call the ESSPLDatabaseBot to fetch the GSTProcessing details
3.2. Call SP rpa_InsertGSTInvoiceBaseData to create the GST Invoice base data
3.3. Call GetCurrencyExchangeRates bot to fetch currency exchange rates
3.4. Call the GenerateInvoiceBot bot to create the GST Invoices
3.5. Call the GenerateGSTReport Bot to create the GST report
3.6. Call the GenerateGSTSoftexReport bot to create the Softex report

value.expression:
Hi Team,

GST Processing completed for the month-year $IntMonth.Number:toString$-$intYear.Number:toString$. 
Please find attached the GST Invoices, GST Report and Softex Report for the same. 

Thanks,
Team Automation

value.string: Call the SP - rpa_UpdateGSTProcessingStatus to update the status
3. Core Coding Section:  Business code starts from here

variables.name: prompt-assignment
variables.description: A variable you can use for assignments

variables.name: o_ErrorMessage
variables.description: Holds the error message

variables.name: o_ErrorLineNo
variables.description: This stores the error line no.

variables.name: o_IsSuccess
variables.description: Holds the final status of the bot execution

variables.name: strBotName
variables.description: This variable stores the current bot name

variables.name: dicConfig
variables.description: This contains the config details for the current bot

variables.name: i_Config
variables.description: Holds all configuration data for all bots

variables.name: strConfigFilePath
variables.description: This holds the location along with file name for the Configuration file.

variables.name: intYear
variables.description: This stores the Year for which GST Processing is to be done.

variables.name: dicResult
variables.description: This variable stores the returned value from the task bot

variables.name: dtResult
variables.description: This stores the data result from the task bot

variables.name: strGetGSTProcessingQuery
variables.description: This holds the query to fetch data from DB for the GST Processing

defaultValue.string:
SELECT * FROM [dbo].[RPA_GSTProcessing]

WHERE STATUS NOT IN ('Closed', 'UpdateToTally', 'Completed') AND (SELECT COUNT(STATUS) FROM [dbo].[RPA_GSTProcessing] WHERE STATUS NOT IN ('Closed', 'UpdateToTally', 'Completed')) = 1

variables.name: strGSTInvoiceFolderPath
variables.description: This holds the path for GST Invoice zip folder

variables.name: strGSTReportFolderPath
variables.description: This holds the path for GST Report file

variables.name: strSoftexReportFolderPath
variables.description: This holds the path for Softex Report file

variables.name: strColSeparator
variables.description: This variable is used as column separator while sending the parameters to SP.

variables.name: strSPParameters
variables.description: This variable contains the Input parameters to be sent to the SP.

variables.name: strRowSeparator
variables.description: This variable is used as row separator while sending the parameters to SP.

variables.name: strStatus
variables.description: This variable stores the GST Processing Status

variables.name: intMonth
variables.description: This stores the Month for which GST Processing is to be done

variables.name: i_SoftexStartNo
variables.description: gets the softex start no

variables.name: i_SoftexEndNo
variables.description: gets the softex End no
